page.title: 11SMEATHARPE-HOW WE SPEND TIME
page.content: Many people are involved in local organisations e.g.Young Farmers' Club; Women's Institute; Keep-Fit Club; School P.T.F.A.; Mother's Union; and various political parties. Most of the residents are keen gard- eners and their efforts enhance the village. Everyone has radio and tele- vision which they listen and watch. Several people regularly play whist, skittles or darts in other villages. In fact one can have quite a busy social life without going very far or spending a lot of money. Many families use the swimming pool and other facilities at Wellington Sports Centre. The boys over 8 can attend the Cub Scout Pack at Hemyock. For cinemas, theatres, nightclubs etc. villagers do have to travel to Taunton, Honiton or Exeter.
